thought: What if the earth suddenly stopped rotating?
Would you rather swim in the air or walk on the ground?
If you knew what would happen at Jurassic Park, would you still go?
Is it feasible to survive skydiving with just your clothes?
Since the grass is always greener on the other side, shouldn't it be easy to get REALLY green grass?
If clothes maketh the man, then which came first? The clothes? Or the man?
Why does one need shampoo AND conditioner?
Why don't people like overlapping text?
